add.instrument.description: Here you can provide the financial instruments you want to be exposed to or just your passives(like money on banking account / saving accounts).

page.signup.description: Join Funds Tracker and begin managing your investment today.
add.cash.accounts.title: Add cash accounts
add.cash.accounts.description: Here you can provide all your cash accounts e.g. daily account you receive your salary, savings account or real cash. <bold>Maximum 10 accounts.</bold>
add.cash.accounts.empty: No accounts added. Add new by clicking button below.
page.introduction.next.step.submit: Confirm and go to next step
page.welcome.description: Manage your investments from single place simply and purely thanks to Funds Tracker
add.portfolios.title: Add your portfolios
add.portfolios.description: Don't be limited to one strategy, divide your investments into <bold>independent portfolios</bold>. For example, you can separate your passively and actively managed portfolios. <bold>Maximum 10 portfolios.</bold>
add.portfolios.empty: No portfolios added. Add new by clicking button below.
error.component.title: Couldn’t load
error.component.description: If this issue continues, please contact support.
page.confirm.description: We've sent a verification code to your email address - <bold>{{email}}</bold> Please enter it below to confirm your email address. (Don't forget to check your spam folder.)
page.confirm.support: Send code again or if you need additional help, please contact us
toast.send_confirm_code.success: Confirmation code has been sent to your email.
toast.send_confirm_code.failure: Code sending failed. Please try again later.
page.cash_accounts.title.description: Here you can manage your cash accounts. You can add new, edit or delete existing ones and check details.
page.introduction.default.currency.title: Choose your default currency
page.introduction.default.currency.descr: Choose the default currency in which you want to display your financial reports. <bold>You can change this later in the settings.</bold>
page.cash_accounts.empty.list.title: No cash accounts added
modal.CreateCashAccount.name: Add new cash account
modal.CreateCashAccount.description: Here you can provide your cash account e.g. daily account you receive your salary, savings account or real cash.
page.forgot_password.enter_email.descrip: Don't worry. Resetting your password is easy, just tell us the email address you registered with Funds tracker.
page.forgot_password.enter_password.desc: Hi, please set your new password for login.
toast.send_reset_password_link.success: Reset password link has been sent to your email.
toast.send_reset_password_link.failure: Reset password link sending failed. Please try again later.
Reset password link has been sent to your email. Please check your inbox.
page.forgot_password.enter_password.subm: Your password has been changed. <signin>You can now log in with your new password.</signin>

page.portfolios.title.description: Here you can manage your portfolios. You can add new, edit or delete existing ones and check details.

modal.CreatePortfolio.name: Add new portfolio
modal.CreatePortfolio.description: Here you can create your new portfolio e.g. passive, active, real estate, etc. An investment portfolio is a collection of assets that you want to invest.
modal.RenamePortfolio.name: Rename portfolio
modal.ConfirmDeletePortfolio.name: Delete portfolio
modal.ConfirmDeletePortfolio.description: Are you sure you want to delete <bold>{{name}}</bold> portfolio? <bold>This action cannot be undone.</bold>
modal.InvestFunds.name: Invest funds
modal.InvestFunds.description: Here you can invest funds in your portfolio.
